text: Train Stop – Two Minutes () is a 1972 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Mark Zakharov and Aleksandr Orlov.Стоянка поезда — две минутыСТОЯНКА ПОЕЗДА - ДВЕ МИНУТЫ (1972) It stars Yuri Belov, Oleg Vidov, and Valentina Telichkina. == Actors == *Yuri Belov – Vasily Nazarovich, the magician *Oleg Vidov – Igor Pavlovich Maksimov, neurologist *Valentina Telichkina – Alyona, a nurse *Alexander Vigdorov – Mikhalko *Alla Budnitskaya – Tamara Sergeevna Krasovskaya, the singer *Lyudmila Ivanova – aunt Liza, a nurse *Yuri Sarantsev – Vlas Petrovich, director of the club * Viktor Sergachyov – Chief Physician *Boris Sichkin – gorodki player, malinger *Kira Smirnova – Glafira Mironovna *Tatyana Gavrilova – mermaid == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1972 fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies
title: Train Stop – Two Minutes
